channel.title: Darin on Darin Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Darin on Darin Portfolio

item.title: Armored Fist
item.description: Drawn on torn-off pages of an old PC game manual.

item.title: The Rarest Fish in Toronto
item.description: My first full length Youtube video documenting a once in a lifetime fishing trip in the Toronto Harbour. Shot and edited by myself.

item.title: The Denim Studio Situation
item.description: Shot and edited a quick interview style check-in with the legend himself: Ben Viapiana.

item.title: Visit from Reg
item.description: Promo for the launch of lil dudes, starring two of my best buds: Josh McGinniss and Coltrane Daniels.

item.title: lil dudes
item.description: A passion project turned product consisting of 10 original characters, all of which I filmed myself drawing from start to completion in videos 1 minute long or less.

item.title: dmb.world launch promo
item.description: Showcasing the complimentary items customers receive with every lil dude and print order, used to promote the launch of dmb.world

item.title: The Lab
item.description: A look into the lab from which dmb.world products are produced

item.title: Mace no Windu
item.description: Included in the “Friends of Knock Twice” Sticker sheet

item.title: Garment Service Naval Jackets
item.description: Lay flat photography, and editing for Garment Service.

item.title: "Colmillo" Hoodie for DATA
item.description: Lay-flat e-commerce shoot, and editing for Tainy’s album DATA merchandise “COLMILLO” Hoodie, and T-Shirt. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Haunted Starbucks Lay-flats
item.description: Lay flat e-commerce shoot, and editing for Haunted Starbucks. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Haunted Starbucks Walmart Boots
item.description: E-commerce product photography, and editing for Haunted Starbucks. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Haunted Starbucks Model Shots
item.description: Model e-commerce shoot, and editing for Haunted Starbucks. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Atmospheric Amateur Wizardry
item.description: Alcohol marker on sketchbook paper. (7" x 10")

item.title: Ode to Portuguese Beer
item.description: This video represents perfectly, a philosophy I haven’t found a name for yet. The idea for this video came to me so quickly, it was so insignificant. Just another one of the hundreds of stupid little ideas I’ll typically have in a week. The difference with this one was, I immediately executed it to completion. My theory is that some of the best ideas are one of the ones that you’d normally dismiss 99% of the time because it doesn’t seem radical enough, or you’d rather not expend the energy needed to make it happen.

item.title: Multiple Men up to No Good
item.description: Earlier example of further exploration into Multiple Men. Alcohol Marker on paper (10 x 14")

item.title: Obamna
item.description: As friends an acquaintances know, i am a fan of the pop-culture symbol that Obama has become. If somethings on my mind, its got to get out, and this time, it happened to be through ink.

item.title: Multiple men (1066)
item.description: A very early version of Multiple Men. A couple Juicy Ass IPA’s and boredom sparked this one. Up until this point i hadn’t spent much time working on Multiple Men, and after completing the last face on the page, it filled me with immense satisfaction, inspiring me to push the concept further. Thus making this a catalyst piece. Alcohol Marker on grid Paper [8.5 x 14]

item.title: Multiple men (304)
item.description: The first large scale variant of Multiple Men. Everything about this version is classic.

item.title: Multiple Men (396)
item.description: First variant of Multiple Men to have baggy jeans, the second MM made at a larger scale.

item.title: Distracted Driver
item.description: Made from old mouse trap packaging, 90’s basketball cards, magazine clippings, and dollar store stickers.

item.title: Souvenirs from the Dump
item.description: A lot of the time I’m making collages, I take pride in knowing that I’m the first person to combine two things together. It’s a very personal process. 1990’s NBA cards, Dollar Store Super Mario Bros Stickers, and film photos from Asia in the 80’s, it screams Darin to me. Made using found, and purchased objects. Postcard sized, (4" x 6").

item.title: Double Dude
item.description: This drawing was made on the backside of the packaging from the corkboards I display my original lil dudes on. I often try to incorporate packaging from significant articles in my life to add to the lore of my art. Marker on glossy paper, (9" x 12").

item.title: Lookin Down
item.description: Someone asked if I was sad when I made this. I’m rarely ever sad, more contemplative if anything. Thats what this guys doing: contemplating.

item.title: Armée D'un
item.description: Shot and edited for Armée D’un. Taken in the Viapiana Dundas Dungeon, 2024.

item.title: Cattle Egret Overwatch
item.description: Two Cattle Egrets perched, getting a nice breeze through their ruffled feathers. Shot in Olhão, Portugal, 2024.

item.title: Glossy Ibis
item.description: My birding goal of this trip was to get a nice shot of just one measly Glossy Ibis. Shortly after expressing my concern for completing said goal, a big flock of them came shooting by right above us. Thankfully, my extreme bird-photography skills and instincts kicked in and I was able to get this awesome composition of the species I had been seeking. Shot in Olhão, Portugal.

item.title: Posted Up
item.description: Alcohol marker on postcard. (4" x 6")

item.title: Knock Twice Finds
item.description: Promotional material for the launch of Knock Twice “Finds”. Shot on the train tracks behind the Knock Twice Studio, Toronto. Starring Aidan Blance, and Owen Lisle.

item.title: Lowkey
item.description: Promotional material for Knock Twice, 2024. Starring JALENXX and NEO 2056.

item.title: Triple Tango
item.description: Not sure if Flamingo’s are always so locked in, but I sure had to be to take this photo. Shot in Tavira, Portugal.

item.title: Thinker Light Promo
item.description: Shot at my family home in Scarborough for Thinker Cannabis, 2024. Starring Owen Lisle, and Greg Pantelic.

item.title: "Aurascapes" for THINKER
item.description: The A.I. “Aurascapes” series for THINKER was made to convey the aura or vibe of nostalgic scenes from the past—ideal for enjoying the specific cannabis strain that each ad promotes. Drawing on my extensive mood board, and rich library of physical media, I created a precise combination of keywords to achieve the vibe of vintage Japanese and Americana magazines. The purpose of this ad campaign was to promote THINKER’s current line of cannabis products to both existing consumers and potential customers.

item.title: Aquatic Stroll
item.description: Components sourced from my catalog of old printed materials ranging from the 1920’s - 1990’s

item.title: Sota at Knock Twice
item.description: Sota Mori, shot and edited by me for Knock Twice, Toronto.

item.title: My Dealer and I
item.description: Made from old film photographs, and old magazine clippings.

item.title: Gull on Rock
item.description: A quick glance at this lone gull on a rock and you might think: “hmm, what a poor little guy, he’s all alone.” But if you take a deeper, longer look… it’s almost as if the cliff face is his big buddy keeping him company. Shot in Bluffers Park, Toronto.

item.title: Birdwatching Alone
item.description: A cold day birding with the pros. Starring Connor Smith, Eildert Beeftink, and Steve McClellan. Toronto, 2024.

item.title: Josh for Thinker
item.description: I threw a relatively large house-party for Halloween in 2023. I wanted it to be the talk of my peers for years to come, really impress people. So much so that I asked Thinker Cannabis to sponsor the house-party. Thinker Cannabis obliged, and came through with a big ass bowl of pre rolls. All I had to do was make some content during the house party. The party ended up getting so out of control I spent the whole night roleplaying the Eye of Sauron in the hopes of minimizing damage created by the chaos.

item.title: Field Research
item.description: It’s difficult to find men wearing sunglasses in physical media prior to the year 2010 who don’t look cool. One of my favorite things to stumble upon when sifting through my library. Made using assorted vintage magazine advertisement clippings, primarily from Golfing Magazines.

item.title: Ouality
item.description: Made from an old MasterCard, U2 Concert Ticket, Mouse Trap, and Mosquito repellent packaging, magazine clippings, and old film photographs. All sourced from the garbage.

item.title: Catch and Release
item.description: Made using Indiana Jones Board game Map, 1990’s Marvel Comic, and 1940’s National Geographic magazine segments.

item.title: Knock Twice Clear Print
item.description: Shot and edited for the Knock Twice Clear Print Graphic Tee Collection. Model: Philip

item.title: you and I, me
item.description: Made from Gameboy Advance packaging, old comic book snippets, and an old film photo.

item.title: Knock Twice Clear Print Tee
item.description: Promotional video for the Knock Twice Clear print collection. Shot at the Knock Twice studio, 2023.

item.description: Staged, shot, and edited for the Knock Twice Clear Print Graphic Tee Collection. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.description: Shot, and edited for PRNGRPHY’s WE LOVE YOU KATE Collection. As seen on Charliexcx, 2024.

item.title: Knock Twice Clear Prints
item.description: Lay-flat photography and editing for the Knock Twice clear print collection. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: No Time for Small Talk
item.description: Made using vintage World of Combat elements I found at one of my favorite Toronto dumps.

item.title: 7-to-1
item.description: Made from a 1990’s Salvador Dali Calendar, the instruction manual from Super Mario Maker, an intel core i5 7th gen processor sticker, a Canadian stamp, and other excerpts from 30 year old editions of ‘Scientific American’ magazines.

item.title: The Lesser of Two Evils
item.description: Made using Scotch Tape packaging, Star Wars playing cards, film photographs, and vintage magazine snippets.

item.title: ladie bec
item.description: Made from old Arabic stamps, an old US stamp, a 44 year old Canadian penny, a chip from a credit card, a vintage Nike stamp I found on a golf course in Montreal, a portion of a Québécois ID I found in an alleyway behind an airbnb, a scrap piece of metal I found on the curb in Scarborough, and old magazine clippings.

item.title: Knock Twice x Eclecstacy Varsity Jacket Graphic
item.description: For the Knock Twice x Eclecstacy Reincarnated Varsity Jackets.

item.description: Designed, shot and edited small capsule of 15 Vintage Re-born Varsity Jackets, for Knock Twice x Eclecstacy. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Knock Twice x Eclecstacy Varsity Jacket
item.description: Shot and edited for the Knock Twice x Eclecstacy Varsity Jacket. Model: Silas

item.title: Gull in Shrubs
item.description: This mother gull wasn’t too happy having a sweaty bearded lunatic staring at her, while she was trying to tend to her nest. Shot in Castro Marim, Porugal.

item.title: Chaffinch
item.description: My family and I went to visit the Almendres Cromlech Megaliths and I ended up spending all my time looking at cool bugs on the surrounding rocks and trees. Needing to take a piss, I walked 50 yards away from the tourists, and saw these Common Chaffinches for the first time.

item.title: On the fence
item.description: Little owls are magical creatures. Very few birds carry such a consistently high dose of aura.

item.title: Eclecstacy Work Jackets
item.description: Product photography and editing for Eclecstacy. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Hard Labor Event Promo
item.description: Shot and edited to promote the Knock Twice Hard Labor event, hosted at the Hard Labour store in Kensington Market, Toronto. Model: Hunter Thomas

item.title: Hard Labour Event Flyer
item.description: This photo was taken by me months prior, and while brainstorming and going through material for the flyer, we came across some old telephoto pictures I had taken years earlier of a crane operator high up in his crane. Initially, I took this photo out of curiosity to see if I could zoom in and see what the operator looked like, with no intention of ever using it for anything else.

item.title: Eclecstacy Trucker Hats
item.description: Product photography and editing for Eclecstacy. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Corm grazing
item.description: Compositionally, this might be one of, if not my greatest bird pic. Look at how the tree line is reflected like a great pyramid, with its tip pointed straight at my absolute boy right there. That cormorant was definitely having a good day. Shot in Tavira, Portugal.

item.title: Corm grazing
item.description: Compositionally, this might be one of, if not my greatest bird pic. Look at how the tree line is reflected like a great pyramid, with its tip pointed straight at my absolute boy right there. That cormorant was definitely having a good day. Shot in Tavira, Portugal.

item.description: Shot and edited for the Knock Twice by Gangbox collection. Akihabara, Tokyo. Models: Fumiya, Naho, and Miho.

item.title: Large-Billed Crow
item.description: Seen on a quick walk around town with Junko. Shot in Nobeoka, Japan.

item.title: Varied Tit
item.description: I wish i could teleport you to where i was in this moment.

item.title: Daurian Redstart
item.description: Japanese birds are a lot like Japan. Lots of earth tones, humble, cute. Shot in Nobeoka, Japan.

item.title: Japanese Cormorant
item.description: Bro didn’t move an inch for like half an hour. Awesome bird. Shot in Beppu, Japan.

item.title: Fish in Lake
item.description: The wettest bird i’ve ever had the pleasure of capturing. Shot in Beppu, Japan.

item.title: Knock Twice Essentials
item.description: Lay-flat product photography, and editing for the Knock Twice Essentials collection. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Yota, Issey, and Shugo for Knock Twice
item.description: Shot and edited for the Knock Twice Essentials Collection. Models: Yota Kayama, Issey Kawamura, and Shugo Sugihara.

item.title: Lost and Found
item.description: This was the first instance in which I envisioned the video, created a detailed storyboard, and the end product turned out exactly how I saw it in my head. I Love this video. Promotional material made for the Knock Twice Essential Logo Collection, 2022. Starring Yota Kayama, Shugo Sugihara, and Issey Kawamura.

item.title: Mass Hysteria Products
item.description: Product photography, and editing for Mass Hysteria. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Another Chance Vol.2 Sticker
item.description: For the follow-up event to showcase and sell graphic tees from Knock Twice, I designed a special sticker that captured the essence and vibe of the event. This sticker was created by scanning elements from vintage magazines, then manipulating and positioning them to fit the aesthetic of our unique venue setup. The main portion of the design features the eyes at the top half, representing the Knock Twice logo, while the large crowd at the bottom symbolizes the attendees of the event, commemorating the occasion perfectly.

item.title: Another Chance Vol.2 Event Poster
item.description: This photo was taken to promote Another Chance Vol. 2, an event emulating the unique Raghouse aesthetic and raising awareness about the issues of fast fashion. The event featured hand-restored vintage graphic tees sourced from massive clothing facilities known as Raghouses. At these facilities, thousands of pounds of clothing are draped chaotically over every surface. Our goal was to bring this eclectic vibe to the event, creating an immersive shopping experience for visitors and highlighting the enormous scale and overflow of used textiles that Raghouses manage.

item.title: The Magic Desk
item.description: Promotional Material for Another Chance Vol.1. Starring Yota Kayama, and Issey Kawamura. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto, 2022.

item.title: Yota's Phonecall
item.description: Promotional Material for the Knock Twice Another Chance Vol.1 event. Shot in the Wiltshire parking lot, Toronto, 2022. Starring Yota Kayama.

item.title: Friends & Neighbours Event Flyer
Friends and Neighbors Promo
item.description: Made to promote the Friends and Neighbors Pop-up hosted at the Knock Twice Studio, Toronto. Starring Cyrel Torrejas, Lin Chentung, Danny Nguyen, Kurtis Tipoff, Leo Le, and Grey Nguyen.

item.title: Yota for Kijiji
item.description: Back to school campaign promo for Kijiji Canada. Shot on the corner of Wiltshire, and Adrian ave, Toronto, 2022. Starring Yota Kayama.

item.title: Castle Guard
item.description: Spotless Starling, eating a worm, on an ancient wall, overlooking the Portuguese beach, on a sunny day. Shot in Ria Formosa, Portugal.

item.title: Side eye
item.description: Tavira is home to some relatively famous Salt Flats. Tavira’s Salt Flats make for a great birding experience at any level, top notch habitat, and a good backdrop for my little subjects. Shot in Selinas de Quatras Aguas, Portugal.

item.title: Owl and Horse
item.description: First time framing two unique beasts in one picture. Taken outside of Tavira on the road to Bodega, Portugal.

item.title: Miles Freedom for Knock Twice
item.description: Shot and edited for Knock Twice, in the Knock Twice Studio. Model: Miles Freedom

item.title: Claire for Knock Twice
item.description: Shot and edited for KnockTwice, 2022. Model: Claire Hoang.

item.title: Kurt for Knock Twice
item.description: Shot, and edited for Knock Twice. Taken in the legendary Wiltshire parking lot. Model: Kurtis Tipoff

item.title: Kait for Knock Twice
item.description: Shot and edited for the Knock Twice Instagram in our reselling era. Thank god Kait lived around the corner from the studio and was always down to shoot some bs. Shoutout Kait. Model: Kait

item.title: SS 22 Knock Twice Collection Shoot
item.description: Editorial photoshoot for the Knock Twice Essential Collection, shot in our (at the time) favourite Raghouse, capturing the overwhelming chaos of thousands of pounds of used clothing. The massive piles of garments highlighted the scale of the often overlooked used clothing industry, surprising our customers and emphasizing our commitment to sustainability. The dramatic setting brought a powerful message to our audience.

item.title: Assorted Products for Knock Twice
item.description: Product photography and editing for Knock Twice. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.description: Shot for the Knock Twice Web launch, 2022.

item.description: E-commerce product photography and editing for ABICSI. Shot in the Knock Twice studio, Toronto.

item.title: Evisu Dowluck Cowichan
item.description: On cold winter days in Scarborough, I dream of the summer lighting we would get at the Knock Twice studio so many years ago. Shot and edited for the Knock Twice Instagram, Toronto.

item.title: Savannah Sparrow
item.description: This little guy had just finished bathing when he decided to land on a branch in the sun and mean mug me. Cant remember where I shot this, Canada.
